channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Windows 10 Servers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Windows 10 Servers

item.title: CVE-2019-0550|2024-08-04T17:51:26.868Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20servers
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Windows Hyper-V on a host server fails to properly validate input from an authenticated user on a guest operating system, aka "Windows Hyper-V Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Windows 10 Servers, Windows 10, Windows Server 2019. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0551.

item.title: CVE-2019-0553|2024-08-04T17:51:26.933Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010%20servers
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when Windows Subsystem for Linux improperly handles objects in memory, aka "Windows Subsystem for Linux Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Windows 10 Servers, Windows 10, Windows Server 2019.
